Esperanto: Mi antaŭĝojas diskuti tion kun vi
Русский язык: С нетерпением жду возможности обсудить это с вами.
Old: 이 내용을 여러분과 논의할 수 있기를 기대합니다.
New: 이 내용을 함께 논의할 수 있기를 기대합니다.
Reason: EO has singular "kun vi" (with you); KO used plural addressee (여러분). Neutral singular-compatible wording restored.

New: 路面が凍って滑りやすいです。
Reason: EO means both icy and slippery (glacie kaj glite); JA previously only said "frozen".
EO means both icy and slippery; ZH previously only said "frozen".
EO means both icy and slippery; KO previously said only "ice formed".
EO fulmas = lightning; JA previously shifted to thunder sound (雷が鳴る).
EO fulmas = lightning; ZH previously shifted to thunder (打雷).
